D√©ploiement en ProductionÔÉÅ

Pr√©requisÔÉÅ

  • Docker & Docker Compose (version 1.25+)

  • Git

  • Un serveur avec au minimum 2 CPU et 4GB RAM

  • PostgreSQL 15+ (optionnel si utilisation managed)

  • Ollama (si d√©ploiement local du LLM)

Architectures Support√©esÔÉÅ

D√©veloppement - Ex√©cution locale avec Docker Compose - Id√©al pour tester et d√©velopper - Temps de d√©marrage : ~30 secondes

Production - Kubernetes (GKE, EKS, AKS) - Cloud Managed Services (Cloud Run, App Engine) - Serveur d√©di√© avec Docker Swarm

D√©ploiement Local avec DockerÔÉÅ

1. Pr√©parer les FichiersÔÉÅ

git clone <repository-url>
cd "BDD f√©d√©r√© par agent"
cp .env.example .env

2. Configurer les VariablesÔÉÅ

√âditer .env :

# Orchestrateur
OLLAMA_BASE_URL=http://ollama:11434
MCP_GATEWAY_URL=ws://mcp-gateway:8000/ws
LOG_LEVEL=INFO

# PostgreSQL
POSTGRES_USER=procom
POSTGRES_PASSWORD=secure_password_here
POSTGRES_DB=federated_db

# Google Gemini (optionnel)
GOOGLE_API_KEY=your_api_key_here

# Environnement
ENVIRONMENT=production
DEBUG=false

3. Lancer l‚ÄôInfrastructureÔÉÅ

# Construire et d√©marrer
docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build

# V√©rifier le statut
docker-compose ps

# Voir les logs
docker-compose logs -f orchestrateur

4. V√©rifier le D√©ploiementÔÉÅ

# Attendre que tous les services soient pr√™ts (~1 minute)
sleep 60

# Tester la sant√©
curl http://localhost:8000/health

# Tester un endpoint
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/query \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"query": "Test de d√©ploiement"}'

D√©ploiement KubernetesÔÉÅ

Pr√©requisÔÉÅ

  • Kubectl configur√©

  • Cluster Kubernetes (GKE, EKS, AKS, local)

  • Helm 3+ (optionnel)

Fichiers KubernetesÔÉÅ

Cr√©er k8s/namespace.yaml :

apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: procom
  labels:
    name: procom

Cr√©er k8s/configmap.yaml :

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: app-config
  namespace: procom
data:
  OLLAMA_BASE_URL: "http://ollama:11434"
  MCP_GATEWAY_URL: "ws://mcp-gateway:8000/ws"
  LOG_LEVEL: "INFO"
  ENVIRONMENT: "production"

Cr√©er k8s/orchestrator-deployment.yaml :

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: orchestrator
  namespace: procom
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: orchestrator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: orchestrator
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: orchestrator
        image: procom/orchestrator:latest
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: app-config
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: "512Mi"
            cpu: "500m"
          limits:
            memory: "2Gi"
            cpu: "1000m"
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5

Cr√©er k8s/service.yaml :

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: orchestrator
  namespace: procom
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - port: 80
    targetPort: 8000
  selector:
    app: orchestrator

D√©ployerÔÉÅ

# Cr√©er le namespace et les ressources
kubectl apply -f k8s/namespace.yaml
kubectl apply -f k8s/configmap.yaml
kubectl apply -f k8s/orchestrator-deployment.yaml
kubectl apply -f k8s/service.yaml

# V√©rifier le d√©ploiement
kubectl get pods -n procom
kubectl get svc -n procom

# Obtenir l'IP externe
kubectl get svc orchestrator -n procom

D√©ploiement Cloud (Cloud Run)ÔÉÅ

Google Cloud RunÔÉÅ

# 1. Construire l'image
docker build -t gcr.io/PROJECT_ID/orchestrator orchestrateur/

# 2. Pousser vers Registry
docker push gcr.io/PROJECT_ID/orchestrator

# 3. D√©ployer sur Cloud Run
gcloud run deploy orchestrator \
  --image gcr.io/PROJECT_ID/orchestrator \
  --platform managed \
  --region europe-west1 \
  --memory 512Mi \
  --timeout 300 \
  --set-env-vars="OLLAMA_BASE_URL=http://ollama:11434,MCP_GATEWAY_URL=ws://gateway:8000/ws"

Monitoring & LogsÔÉÅ

PrometheusÔÉÅ

Cr√©er prometheus.yml :

global:
  scrape_interval: 15s

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'orchestrator'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['localhost:8000']

D√©ployer Prometheus :

docker run -d -p 9090:9090 -v $(pwd)/prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml prom/prometheus

Logs Centralis√©s (ELK Stack)ÔÉÅ

# D√©ployer ELK avec Docker Compose
docker-compose -f elk-compose.yml up -d

# Acc√©der √† Kibana
# http://localhost:5601

MaintenanceÔÉÅ

Backup Base de Donn√©esÔÉÅ

# Sauvegarder PostgreSQL
docker exec procom_postgres_1 pg_dump -U procom federated_db > backup.sql

# Restaurer
docker exec -i procom_postgres_1 psql -U procom federated_db < backup.sql

Mise √† JourÔÉÅ

# R√©cup√©rer les nouvelles sources
git pull origin main

# Reconstruire les images
docker-compose build

# Red√©marrer les services
docker-compose up -d

# V√©rifier la sant√©
curl http://localhost:8000/health

Scaling HorizontalÔÉÅ

# Augmenter le nombre de r√©plicas Orchestrator
docker-compose up -d --scale orchestrator=3

D√©pannage D√©ploiementÔÉÅ

Service ne d√©marre pasÔÉÅ

# V√©rifier les logs
docker-compose logs orchestrator

# Inspecter l'image
docker inspect procom:orchestrator

# V√©rifier les d√©pendances
docker-compose ps

Port d√©j√† utilis√©ÔÉÅ

# Changer le port dans docker-compose.yml
# Ou tuer le processus
lsof -i :8000
kill -9 <PID>

Connexion MCP √©chou√©eÔÉÅ

# V√©rifier que la passerelle MCP est active
curl http://localhost:8000/servers

# V√©rifier la configuration
cat config/servers.json

# Red√©marrer le service
docker-compose restart mcp-gateway

Certificats SSL/TLSÔÉÅ

G√©n√©rer un Certificat Auto-Sign√©ÔÉÅ

# G√©n√©rer cl√© priv√©e et certificat
openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -nodes \
  -out cert.pem -keyout key.pem -days 365

# Placer dans certs/
mkdir -p certs
mv cert.pem certs/
mv key.pem certs/

Configurer Nginx avec SSLÔÉÅ

Dans nginx/nginx.conf :

server {
    listen 443 ssl;
    server_name your-domain.com;

    ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/certs/cert.pem;
    ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/certs/key.pem;

    location / {
        proxy_pass http://orchestrator:8000;
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    }
}

Optimisations PerformanceÔÉÅ

CachingÔÉÅ

# Dans orchestrator/main.py
from fastapi_cache2 import FastAPICache2
from fastapi_cache2.backends.redis import RedisBackend

redis_url = "redis://redis:6379"
FastAPICache2.init(RedisBackend(redis_url), prefix="fastapi-cache")

Connection PoolingÔÉÅ

Augmenter la taille du pool MCP dans mcp/mcp-gateway/main.py :

pool_size = 20  # Par d√©faut 10
mcp_client = MCPClientPool(pool_size=pool_size)

CompressionÔÉÅ

Dans nginx/nginx.conf :

gzip on;
gzip_types text/plain application/json text/css;
gzip_min_length 1000;
